author: Minifig290
title: Neat Little Promotional Product
review:
Hello all today i will be taking a short look at the LEGO Promotional 5006066 Brick Friday 2019 Brick that was given out at LEGO Brand Stores during the Black Friday weekend with all in store purchases over £55.

Brick

The brick is just a black 2x4 brick with a nice golden print saying "BRICK FRIDAY 2019", this will go perfectly with the Brick Friday Minifigure that was given out at LEGO Shop with purchases over £75 on Cyber Monday 2019.

Packageing

This package is just a simple plastic blister pack used for Comic Con and Grand Store opening figures, the cardboard backing has the theming of the 2019 Black Friday on it with a black tag saying "2019 BLACK FRIDAY", also strange to mention its a 4+ set though i doubt any child under 10 will manage to get this unless there quite lucky

___________________________________________________________________________

Overall

A great little freebie though according to the recipt this if it was to be sold would be £3.99 which would be a bit of a silly price for a single brick. If anyone is planning on getting the Brick Friday figure this would go perfectly with it.

Right now the eBay prices of this single little brick are sort of ridicoulus, the cheapest buy it now price i could see as of writing was just short of £18. So this little freebie is a good investment for those who want to make some money back of their purchase

Pros - Great little cremaritive promotion

Cons - Resellers selling this at a fortune making it unappealing for anyone wanting it who missed it
